trans-unit.source: Represents a System Access Control List (SACL).
trans-unit.target: 表示系统访问控制列表 (SACL)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>用指定的值的类。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object is a container.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果新<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象是一个容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object is a directory object Access Control List (ACL).
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果新<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象是目录对象的访问控制列表 (ACL)。

trans-unit.source: The number of Access Control Entries (ACEs) this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object can contain.
trans-unit.target: 访问控制项 (Ace) 数这<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象可以包含。

trans-unit.source: This number is to be used only as a hint.
trans-unit.target: 此数值可用于仅作为提示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> class with the specified values from the specified <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>用指定的值从指定的类<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The Access Control Entries (ACEs) in the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl> object are cloned.
trans-unit.target: 在访问控制项 (Ace)<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl>克隆对象。</xref:System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object is a container.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果新<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象是一个容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object is a directory object Access Control List (ACL).
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果新<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象是目录对象的访问控制列表 (ACL)。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl"></xref> object for the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 基础<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.RawAcl"></xref>新对象<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to create an empty ACL.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>若要创建空的 ACL。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> class with the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>用指定的值的类。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object is a container.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果新<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象是一个容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object is a directory object Access Control List (ACL).
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果新<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象是目录对象的访问控制列表 (ACL)。

trans-unit.source: The revision level of the new <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 新的修订级别<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The number of Access Control Entries (ACEs) this <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object can contain.
trans-unit.target: 访问控制项 (Ace) 数这<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象可以包含。

trans-unit.source: This number is to be used only as a hint.
trans-unit.target: 此数值可用于仅作为提示。

trans-unit.source: Adds an audit rule to the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将审核规则添加到当前<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Adding an audit rule might cause one or more existing Access Control Entries (ACEs) to be combined.
trans-unit.target: 添加的审核规则可能会导致一个或多个现有访问控制项 (Ace) 组合在一起。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> for which to add an audit rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>为其添加审核规则。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectAuditRule"></xref>for the new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectAuditRule"></xref>新的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: Adds an audit rule to the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将审核规则添加到当前<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Adding an audit rule might cause one or more existing Access Control Entries (ACEs) to be combined.
trans-unit.target: 添加的审核规则可能会导致一个或多个现有访问控制项 (Ace) 组合在一起。

trans-unit.source: The type of audit rule to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的审核规则的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> for which to add an audit rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>为其添加审核规则。

trans-unit.source: The access mask for the new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 新的审核规则的访问掩码。

trans-unit.source: Flags that specify the inheritance properties of the new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定新的审核规则的继承属性的标志。

trans-unit.source: Flags that specify the inheritance propagation properties for the new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定新的审核规则的继承传播属性的标志。

trans-unit.source: Adds an audit rule with the specified settings to the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将审核规则添加到当前指定的设置与<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this method for directory object Access Control Lists (ACLs) when specifying the object type or the inherited object type for the new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 目录对象的访问控制列表 (Acl) 时指定的对象类型或新的审核规则的继承的对象类型使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The type of audit rule to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的审核规则的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> for which to add an audit rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>为其添加审核规则。

trans-unit.source: The access mask for the new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 新的审核规则的访问掩码。

trans-unit.source: Flags that specify the inheritance properties of the new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定新的审核规则的继承属性的标志。

trans-unit.source: Flags that specify the inheritance propagation properties for the new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 指定新的审核规则的继承传播属性的标志。

trans-unit.source: Flags that specify if the `objectType` and `inheritedObjectType` parameters contain non-<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的标志`objectType`和`inheritedObjectType`参数包含非<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the class of objects to which the new audit rule applies.
trans-unit.target: 新的审核规则应用到的对象的类的标识。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the class of child objects which can inherit the new audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 类可以继承新的审核规则的子对象的标识。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified audit rule from the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 从当前中移除指定的审核规则<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Audit removal is accomplished by using a complex algorithm that might add ACEs in addition to removing them.
trans-unit.target: 审核删除通过使用复杂的算法，可能会添加 Ace 除了删除它们。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> for which to remove an audit rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>为其删除的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectAuditRule"></xref> for which to remove an audit rule.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectAuditRule"> </xref>为其删除的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method successfully removes the specified audit rule; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此方法已成功移除指定的审核规则;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified audit rule from the current <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 从当前中移除指定的审核规则<xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>为其删除的审核规则。

trans-unit.source: This method removes all existing Access Control Entries (ACEs) that match both specified <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object and the specified audit condition.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将移除指定的所有现有访问控制项 (Ace) 的匹配两者<xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>对象和指定的审核条件。</xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>
